CustomField.formula: IF(GDMFSL_Is_Classified__c = FALSE, (GDMFSL_Address__r.Street & "," & GDMFSL_Address__r.City & "," & TEXT(GDMFSL_Address__r.StateCode) & " " & GDMFSL_Address__r.PostalCode), "Undisclosed Location")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula based on the address of the location to obscure the location address for classified locations for service reports.
CustomField.label: Address
